ARABIC: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What is there but our life in this world? We die and we live and we will not be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is only the life of this world: We die and we live: there is no rising from the dead for us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There is no other life than the life of the world. We shall live here and here shall we die; and we are not going to be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is our only life. We live and will die but we will never be brought back to life again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “There is nothing except our life of this world, we die and we live, and we are not to be raised.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: There is nothing but our life of this world! We die and we live! And we are not going to be resurrected!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There is naught but our life in this world; we die and we live and we shall not be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: There is nothing but our present life; we die, and we live, and we shall not be raised up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There is naught but our life of the world; we die and we live, and we shall not be raised (again).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There exists only our present life: we die and we live [but once], and shall never be raised up again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: There is nought but our life of the world; we die and we live, and we are not going to be raised Up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is nothing but the life of this world: we live and die, and we will not be resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: There is nothing but our life in this world! We shall die and we live! But we shall never be raised up again!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: There is nothing but our life of this world! We die and we live! And we are not going to be resurrected!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There is nothing but our present life; we die, and we live, and we shall not be resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: There is nothing but our life in this world. We die, and we live, and we are not resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Life is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:37] There is nothing, that is, there is no life, but our life in this world: we die, and we live, [again only] through the lives of our offspring, and we shall not be raised [again].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There is naught but our life of the world; we die and we live) the fathers die and their children live, (and we shall not be raised (again)) after we die.
